name: Dodgeball Survivor
description:
Dodgeball Survivor is a game where you play the best dodgeball player in the school so you decide to take on the entire school at once.

You need to grab or dodge the incoming balls and throw them back at your ennemies to gain score.

This game is an Unfinished Human Academy Game Jam project, I'm planning on making it actually decent when I will take the time to.  Many things were cut and some are still in the files waiting for a few lines to finish due to team issues (like animations and sfx) and some things needs global improvement (like controls), feel free to report any issue at all.
